name: 2016 The 4th International Conference on Business and Social Sciences
content: 2016 The 4th International Conference on Business and Social Sciences (ICBASS) is an interdisciplinary international conference that invites academics and independent scholars and researchers from around the world to meet and exchange the latest ideas and discuss issues concerning Business and Social Sciences fields towards sustainable development. We are now accepting submissions in any area related to Business and Social Sciences fields, and all submissions will be refereed, and accepted papers will be included in the official conference proceedings, which will have an assigned ISBN number. Further information, please email icbass@icbass.org.
